body_html: Yes, I think we have to make the names the same, so we don't break old checkpoints. I'd prefer to still use variable_scope with default name, so that it's ok if someone uses 2 different Adams. But if there is only one, we need to make the names the same. Can you do that? Great thanks for the careful PR!

body: Yes, I think we have to make the names the same, so we don't break old checkpoints. I'd prefer to still use variable_scope with default name, so that it's ok if someone uses 2 different Adams. But if there is only one, we need to make the names the same. Can you do that? Great thanks for the careful PR!
